entry.data:
SUNNY AND MUCH COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR, COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON

CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

CLOUDY
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING

LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
